code: import cartType from'./cart.types';export var cartToggle=function cartToggle(){return{type:cartType.CART_TOGGLE};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartType.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartType.REMOV,payload:item};};export var removeOneItem=function removeOneItem(item){return{type:cartType.REMOVITEM,payload:item};};
